price: われら*が敬虔*な者たちを、使節団として慈悲あまねき*お方（アッラー*）の御許へと召集する（復活の*）日。
arabic: يَوۡمَ نَحۡشُرُ ٱلۡمُتَّقِينَ إِلَى ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنِ وَفۡدٗا

version.title: Japanese translation - Saeed Sato
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Japanese by Saeed Sato. printed in 1440 H.

meta.transliteration: yawma naḥshuru al-mutaqīna ilā al-raḥmāni wafdan
